what’s wrong?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多彩な技と魔法を武器にするケイブリス派で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Kebris faction, which wields a variety of skills and magic as weapons,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: NO.2の実力を持つ強敵だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a formidable enemy with the power ranked No. 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人バボラ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭は悪いがとにかく体が規格外にでかい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's not smart, but his body is extraordinarily huge.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鬼の魔人で、戦闘になると面倒だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A demon ogre, he’s troublesome in battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人レイ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Rei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷を操る乱暴な奴でな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s a violent guy who controls thunder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつには何度も苦労させられた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and he has caused me trouble many times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人メディウサ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: へびさんの魔人で、恐ろしい執念深さと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A snake demon, with terrifying persistence and...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 非常に強力な使徒を持つ奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a very powerful apostle at her command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ガルティア。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Galtia.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食うことと寝ることと戦うことが好きと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He boasts that he likes eating, sleeping, and fighting,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 豪語する奴で、腹の中の使徒含めて厄介な奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and including the apostle inside his belly, he’s a troublesome fellow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人パイアール。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Pyar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭だけが極端に良くなったような奴で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s like a guy whose head alone has become extremely smart...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大量の科学兵器を作り出してくる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who creates a large amount of scientific weapons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人レッドアイ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前も既に会っていたな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’ve already met him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知っての通りのキチガイ魔人だ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As you know, he’s a crazy demon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ワーグ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Warg...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夢を操る恐ろしい魔人で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A terrifying demon who controls dreams...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、いや、こいつは覚えなくていい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, you don’t need to remember this one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時はケイブリス派にいたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was once in the Kebris faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々勝手気ままで戦争に興味がない奴なんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but he’s originally selfish and uninterested in war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、もう戦うこともないだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, he probably won’t fight anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ハウゼルと、魔人シルキィ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Demon Howzel and Demon Silky...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じホーネット派の仲間である二人は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two comrades from the Hornet faction...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はケイブリスに捕まっているらしい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: apparently are now captured by Kebris...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「二人も早く……救い出さなきゃ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to rescue both of them soon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結構な数がいるなあ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s quite a number of them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、そんな気楽に言うな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, don’t say it so casually.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が倒さなければいけない連中だぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These are the ones you have to defeat, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰か一人だけでも国を潰すのなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even one of them alone can easily destroy a country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 容易にやってのけるような奴らだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they’re capable of doing that with ease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に気合いを入れないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you really don’t get fired up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんて簡単に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone like you will easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は無敵で最強だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am invincible and the strongest!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから楽勝なのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why this is an easy win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから人の話を真面目に聞けと――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I’m telling you, listen seriously to what I’m saying—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、俺に任せろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人共なんてあっという間に倒してやるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll take down those demons in no time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラの為にもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Satella’s sake as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うくっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは自分の左胸を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella pressed her left chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐぐぐ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugggh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、どうした？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Hey, what’s wrong?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が倒さなければいけない連中だぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These are the ones you have to defeat, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰か一人だけでも国を潰すのなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even one of them alone can easily destroy a country,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 容易にやってのけるような奴らだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they’re capable of doing that with ease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当に気合いを入れないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you really don’t get fired up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前なんて簡単に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: someone like you will easily...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は無敵で最強だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am invincible and the strongest!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから楽勝なのだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why this is an easy win!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから人の話を真面目に聞けと――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I’m telling you, listen seriously to what I’m saying—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、俺に任せろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人共なんてあっという間に倒してやるさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll take down those demons in no time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラの為にもな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For Satella’s sake as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うくっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは自分の左胸を押さえた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella pressed her left chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐぐぐ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugggh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、どうした？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-Hey, what’s wrong?
